metadata.Title: CVE-2021-30019 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: In the adts_dmx_process function in filters/reframe_adts.c in GPAC 1.0.1, a crafted file may cause ctx->hdr.frame_size to be smaller than ctx->hdr.hdr_size, resulting in size to be a negative number and a heap overflow in the memcpy.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
